actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.

official_title: To amend the Federal Election Campaign Act of 1971 to prohibit all individuals who are not citizens or nationals of the United States from making contributions or expenditures in connection with elections for Federal office.
short_title: Illegal Foreign Contributions Prohibition Act of 1999

summary.text: Illegal Foreign Contributions Prohibition Act of 1999 - Amends the Federal Election Campaign Act of 1971 to prohibit contributions or expenditures by a foreign national in connection with the election of candidates for Federal political office.

titles.title: Illegal Foreign Contributions Prohibition Act of 1999

To amend the Federal Election Campaign Act of 1971 to prohibit all individuals who are not citizens or nationals of the United States from making contributions or expenditures in connection with elections for Federal office.
